main.advantage.title: Unique Advantages
main.advantage.li1: Experienced in Generative AI applications and AI retail integration, adept at combining real-world scenarios with data to create new solutions. Holds Generative AI and AI Application Planner certifications, with plans for advanced AI credentials.
main.advantage.li2: Cross-industry (department stores/finance/consulting/research) and cross-organizational (startup/foundation/firm/MNC) experience, with cross-functional expertise (sustainability/logistics/management/PM/finance/HR). Adept at navigating diverse organizational structures and providing consulting value.
